class.name: SxFAFont
class.description: Font management wrapper around FontAwesome. + Make sure you <<_fontawesome_icons_integration,read the docs about JSON>> before using the component.

method.name: create_fa_font
method.description: Lazily create a FontAwesome font, using a specific font family and a size. + If the font already exists, it will be returned. + If not, it will be created.

method.name: get_icon_code
method.description: Get the icon unicode code point from its string representation.
